review: I love this. Seamlessly transitioning from watching something on my iphone or ipad to the TV and best thing about it... you don't need to change the source on your controller! Turning on the Chromecast button via any app will automatically log it on your TV. Also...when you aren't watching something, there are gorgeous backdrops on your TV.I would've bought this if it were over $75

review: So I'm one of the few ppl that works with Google/android type products, but it is very limited in the apps that will cast and the few they suggest only work occasionally. The codecs for the tips of video, music, and pictures are limited so the apps they suggest to cast your own stuff doesn't show. So if you are looking to watch Netflix, Hulu, or YouTube on your tv from your phone, then this is the product for you. If not, don't waste your money.
author: Ms. Smith

review: ProsInsanely easy to set upWorks wellComes with hdmi extender for TVs with less accessible portsWhen a show is loaded on the device you don't have to continue to "cast." For instance once you load a Netflix movie from your phone onto the chromecast. You can do other things on your phone, or your phone could die and the show would still playConsIt would be nice to have some interface and selection on the tv rather than have it all on a separate deviceSometimes the remote loses sync with the chromecast but I feel that is something that can be fixed with a bug update
